name: Council Tool Velvicut 2.25 Lb Premium Boy's Axe
description: Category: Camping The Velvicut® line of products represents Council Tool's finest accomplishment in the axe making craft. The 2.25 lb. Premium Velvicut® Boy's axe is a great mid size tool for camping or around the home, small enough to pack and carry, yet big enough to get the job done. The eye of this axe has been pierced with a special punch, forming ribs horizontally and vertically inside. This creates more contact area and bite between the head to handle joint, for an improved hold. The custom Grade "A" Appalachian hickory handle features a prominent grip and a slim body that allows it to flex a bit, which improves the ergonomics. White sapwood and red heartwood are equally suitable as there is no difference in the specific density or strength of the wood. A Linseed oil coating has been applied to protect the handle. The cutting edge of the 5160 alloy steel head has been tempered to Rc 52-56 to hold an edge, then hand sharpened by an experienced artisan using increasingly fine abrasives and finished with leather stropping. Head: 2.25 lb. drop forged 5160 alloy steel, tempered to Rockwell 52-56. Handle: Custom 28-inch (before assembly) Grade "A" Appalachian hickory, selected for grain orientation and density. Overall Weight: 3.5 lbs. Council Tool part number: JP22DV28C A premium leather Made in USA sheath is included to protect the tool and the user. -C.H. All components (axe, handle, and sheath) Made in USA. Read more about C.H.'s love for Council Tool Velvicut axes here. In Stock

With a clean matte finish to blend into your environment or gear, the Vapur MicroFilter is your new best friend for travel and backcountry adventure. True to all Vapur Anti-Bottles, they are designed to withstand everyday use and regular cleaning. Burning at nearly 5500°F (3000°C), it works even when wet, with more than 3000 fire-starting strikes in one replaceable ferrocerium rod. Included is an extra set of o-rings, a split key ring for every day carry and instructions. For even better sparks, slowly scrape shavings off the rod into a small pile on top of your tinder. name: Randolph Engineering Sportsman Sunglasses - Gold Frame Tan Polarized Lens
description: Category: Eyewear The Randolph Engineering® Sportsman style sunglass is designed for the outdoor enthusiast. Featuring an extremely durable frame to stand up to the harshest of conditions, it is an essential piece of equipment for your next adventure. This model features a gold finished frame, tan polarized mineral glass lenses and skull style temples. A tan polarized lens works exceptionally well in low light, on foggy and overcast days and in bright conditions where glare reduction is needed. The specialized tint cuts off the transmittance of scattered blue light, increasing contrast and visual acuity. When the adventure calls for it I wear my Randolph Engineering Sportsman sunglasses with grey polycarbonate lenses, the lightweight material is the same they use in their RE Ranger shooting eyewear. Randolph Engineering is so confident they make a product which will last you a lifetime they include a maintenance kit with each pair of sunglasses. The kit contains an optical screwdriver along with extra screws and an extra set of nose pads. They also guarantee their solder joints for life, assuming normal use. Each pair also comes with a hard case and RE lens cloth. 57mm is the ideal size for faces measuring 5.5" from temple to temple. Free shipping of Randolph Engineering Sunglasses within the United States including Alaska and Hawaii. -C.H. Made in USA.

name: Kelly Kettle Stainless Trekker
description: Category: Camping It seems backwards to have to take fuel into the woods to be able to boil water. In simpler times all you needed was some dry tinder and a match. In the Kelly Kettle I found my way back to those times. I am able to pack this well built stainless tool and have hot water in minutes, wherever I am, without building a large fire or having to pack expensive fuel with me. Simply build a small fire in the base of the Kelly Kettle using twigs, pinecones, dry grass, bark or similar materials found close by. Place the water filled Kettle on top of the base before lighting the fire through the vent hole on the side of the base. Once burning, continue to load materials for the fire into the top hole of the Kelly Kettle. The fire burns all the way up the middle of the Kelly Kettle while the water heats quickly and evenly in the walls the the Kettle. At any elevation or location, I have never been caught without the ability to boil water quickly for my twice daily cup of coffee with the Kelly Kettle. I keep it available for any situation I might be in, camping, hiking, scouting, hunting, survival, emergency preparedness or when working on my own property when I just don't feel like heading in. Each Kelly Kettle comes with a fire base and drawstring carrying bag. -C.H. Capacity: 19.3 fl. oz Weight: 1.7 lbs Height: 10.6 inches (packed) Diameter: 5.5 inches (widest point @ rim of base) Imported.

name: Obenauf's Heavy Duty LP
description: Category: C.H. Preferred™ Formulas Obenauf's Heavy Duty Leather Preservative (LP) is the most durable protection available. Originally developed for the severe conditions endured by wildland firefighters, LP protects, preserves, and restores boots, saddles, motorcycle leathers, tool pouches, gloves, baseball mitts, and more. It is especially useful for any leather that gets worked hard and is regularly exposed to harsh environments. Three natural oils are suspended in Beeswax and Propolis. In the leather these oils gradually seep out of the Beeswax/Propolis suspension formula. If exposed to heat or flexing the oils are released faster so leather gets oiled instead of parched and cracked. This Beeswax/Propolis* Suspension Formula provides a time release lubrication to inner fibers while the surface is reinforced against scuffing, and the leather still breathes. The result is Obenauf's Heavy Duty LP: Repels water better and longer. Repels acids, petroleum, salt, and chemicals. Restores dried leather to a soft and supple condition and protects it from further damage. Prevents dry rot and resists mildew. Resists premature cracking in flex areas. Is odorless after applied (very important for hunters) Restores sun-faded leather. Resists scuffing and dry rot. Applies easily with with a clean cloth. Penetrates deeply into leather. Can be buffed to shine or polished over. Contains no harmful silicones, petroleums, solvents, or neatsfoot. *Propolis resists bacteria and mildew, and is a barrier against manure acid, salt, caustic chemicals, and petroleum. Combined with beeswax it repels water better and longer. -C.H. Available in 8 oz. and 4 oz. Made in USA.

name: Exotac tinderTin
description: Category: Camping Fatwood comes from pine tree stumps that contain a large amount of resin. It lights quickly, burns hot, and is wind and moisture tolerant. Exotac's Fatwood is 100% natural and grown right here in Georgia, USA. It is recovered from the lumber industry as waste and repurposed as the tinderTIN™ fire-starting materials. Carry one of their fatwood tinderTIN™ with you, and you'll never be without easy-to-light tinder. Exotac tested a large range of tinder both natural and synthetic and these two came out on top when evaluated on flammability, water resistance and burn time. The fatwood shavings can be easily lit with an open flame or with a little practice, a ferrocerium fire starter like their nanoSTRIKER™. The fatwood splinters are best lit with another tinder such as fatwood shavings, cotton balls, dry grass, or an open flame. For best success stack the fatwood splinters log-cabin-style to increase the available oxygen. Light the thinnest portion of the splinter: typically the end of the splinter where it is sharpest. - C.H. Made in USA. Splinters Tin Dia.: 3.20" Splinters Tin Ht.: 0.90" Splinters Net Wt.: 1.06oz Splinters Gross Wt.: 2.5oz Shavings Tin Dia.: 2.75" Shavings Tin Ht.: 0.90" Shavings Net Wt.: 0.21oz Shavings Gross Wt.: 1.3oz

name: Exotac FREEKey System
description: Category: Workshop Designed in Sweden and manufactured in the USA from high-grade stainless steel, Exotac FreeKey rings eliminate the always challenging operation of a traditional key ring by opening with the simple press of the ring. Featuring a brilliant and simple design FreeKey rings achieve enhanced ease of operation by introducing a strategically placed bump in one of the ring loops - essentially creating a pivot that allows the end of the ring to lift when the ring is pressed. Exotac Freekey system includes three small group rings for organizing keys. The group rings are smart rings that organize your keys in easy to identify groups that can be conveniently removed and returned to the master ring with the press of the ring. With three wicks in each candle, two different wick burn rates, and two tin sizes, these candles can be a source of light or a powerhouse of heat. The hot-burn candle can even be used to boil water in a pinch. The hot burn wick provides a flame height of 1-2". Use this candle for drying out tinder, boiling water, or warming an emergency blanket. Exercise caution when using all three wicks as the tin becomes hot to the touch. The hot burn wick will boil 8oz of water in 18 minutes. The slow burn wick offers the longest burn time. Pair the slow burn wick with the large candle for a 30Hr continous burn candle. name: Exotac MATCHCAP XL
description: Category: Camping The MATCHCAP XL™ is a nearly indestructible waterproof match case for storing matches and other fire starting material. By integrating the red-phosphorus striker into the threaded are of the capsule, we created an innovative solution for having to pack separate match strikers. To ensure our match case was going to be the best out there, we added a concealed o-ring, durable square threads, a bottom strike-anywhere striker, and a high-end aesthetic to bring it all together. The MATCHCAP XL™ can carry all sizes of matches from the standard kitchen strike-on-the-box to NATO lifeboat matches and even the extended length stormproof matches. With the dual-striker design you can use safety matches, strike-anywhere matches, or a combination of two. An O-ring keeps both the matches and the red phosphorus (strike-on-the-box) striker dry. The MATCHCAP XL™ isn’t limited to just matches. Using a Stormproof (2.9” long) match, leaves 0.3” to spare for tinder storage. If using kitchen matches, nearly half of the MATCHCAP XL™ is available for storage. Use the extra space to store water purification tablets, tinder, medicine, fishing hooks, first aid kit, etc. For maximum match capacity, place a majority of the matches head up with a few head down. Waterproof, safe and redundant match striker design Replaceable striking pads Works with both safety and strike anywhere matches Fits matches more than 2.9" in length Scalloped body allows easy match removal Square threaded cap for maximum durability Waterproof to depths >5 meters Lightweight aircraft grade 6061 aluminum construction Anodized and laser engraved for durability Unique knurl for grip and use with strike anywhere matches Available in Gunmetal and Blaze Orange Included in the box: Extra O-rings Extra match strikers User manual - C.H. Length: 3.60" Diameter: 1.20" Weight: 1.25oz Strike: 25-50 per pad Match Capacity: Kitchen: 40 Stormproof: 25 Nato: 32 Made in USA.

name: UCO Stormproof Matches
description: Category: Camping UCO Stormproof Matches are the best matches available for harsh conditions. Each match burns for about 15 seconds even if it is windy, rainy, or cold. The matches even burn underwater. Two large stand-alone strikers are included. A great combination with the MATCHCAP XL. TIPS These matches burn quickly and aggressively so be prepared. Although wind and water will not put them out, it will hamper your ability to ignite other materials by reducing the flame size. Be sure to have a wind break and fire preparations in place prior to lighting these. The stick of these matches does NOT burn. Once the material has been consumed (15s), the match will go out. It is recommended to take along several types of matches to increase your fire starting possibilities. In this case we still recommend paring these stormproof matches with standard kitchen matches. - C.H. 1 Box of 25 Matches 2 Extra Strikers Included Imported.

Starting with the coarse side it is easy to quickly tune up the edge of your axe or machete before, during and after use. It is great for home, camp, tool box, gardening shed and more. Fine/coarse FWFC for your sharpening needs. -C.H. Stone size: 4.33" x .875" x .25" Size: 9 1/2" open. 5" closed. Made in USA.

Case: Yellow Made in USA.

name: Kelly Kettle Stainless Base Camp
description: Category: Camping It seems backwards to have to take fuel into the woods to be able to boil water. In simpler times all you needed was some dry tinder and a match. In the Kelly Kettle I found my way back to those times. I am able to pack this well built stainless tool and have hot water in minutes, wherever I am, without building a large fire or having to pack expensive fuel with me. Simply build a small fire in the base of the Kelly Kettle using twigs, pinecones, dry grass, bark or similar materials found close by. Place the water filled Kettle on top of the base before lighting the fire through the vent hole on the side of the base. Once burning, continue to load materials for the fire into the top hole of the Kelly Kettle. The fire burns all the way up the middle of the Kelly Kettle while the water heats quickly and evenly in the walls the the Kettle. At any elevation or location, I have never been caught without the ability to boil water quickly for my twice daily cup of coffee with the Kelly Kettle. I keep it available for any situation I might be in, camping, hiking, scouting, hunting, survival, emergency preparedness or when working on my own property when I just don't feel like heading in. Each Kelly Kettle comes with a fire base and drawstring carrying bag. -C.H. Capacity: 50.7 fl. oz (1.5L / 6 cups) Weight: 2.67 lbs Height: 13 inches (packed) Diameter: 7.3 inches (widest point @ rim of base) Imported.

description: Category: C.H. Preferred™ Formulas Use Obenauf's Leather Oil for regular maintenance and preservation of leather items, specially when warm, dusty, or dry conditions are dehydrating your valuable leathers. Our Leather Oil is a gentle blend of natural oils, waxes, and propolis that extends the life of leather and also rejuenates neglected, dried, faded leather. Easier to apply than our Heavy Duty LP, it provides fast, convenient protection that also preserves. Obenauf's Leather Oil: Restores dried leather to a soft and supple condition. Restores sun-faded leather. Repels water. Resists cracking, scuffing, and dry rot. Applies easily with the applicator cap or with a clean cloth. Penetrates deeply into leather. Can be buffed to shine or polished over. Excellent for touch-ups between applications of Heavy Duty LP. Contains no harmful silicones, petroleums, solvents, or neatsfoot. Gentle on the leather, but remarkably tough in it's preservation qualities, Obenauf's Leather Oil is perfect for leather furniture, exotic dress boots, saddles & tack, motorcycle leather (provides outstanding protection against wind, sun, and water), garments, baseball gloves, work boots (firefighters use it to protect their boots from scorching heat of forest fires), automotive seat leather (protects it from the baking sun) holsters & scabbards, and much more. -C.H. Available in both 16 fl. oz. and 8 fl. oz. Made in USA.

name: Woodman's Pal Military Premium 284
description: Category: Camping The Woodman's Pal® Military Premium 284 (LC-14-B) is their very best model. This thoughtfully designed land clearing tool cuts brush and saplings up to 1 ½” in diameter with a single stroke. The chisel sharp sickle hook is great for slicing through blackberries and other woody vines with a tug. The curved leather grip is extremely comfortable in the hand, cool in the summer and warm in the winter. It requires less effort to maintain a safe grip and reduces the tendency for hot spots that lead to blisters. The wrap around knuckle guard not only protects, it helps keep the hand from sliding off the handle. When paired with the vintage canvas sheath, the Woodman's Pal is easily and safely carried during a variety of activities. It protects the blade, you and your four legged friend. Keeping your machete where you want it when you need it. This is the original military design brought back due to popular demand. Mil-Spec olive green canvas attaches to your belt via a canvas loop, zippered closure with two interior pockets. It is preferred by Surveyors, Foresters, Nurserymen, Fire & Rescue, Hunters, Campers, Hikers, Survivalists, Pilots, Boaters, Land Managers, Gardeners, Farmers and Highway Crews. It comes very sharp and ready to work from the factory. Because I prefer a shaving sharp edge, I sharpen my Woodman's Pal with my Edge Pro Apex sharpening system. Due to the qualities of the steel the edge is long lasting and only needs occasional touchups. The Woodman's Pal is handcrafted in Pennsylvania with all American made raw materials. Military issue since 1941. -C.H. Key features include: • Specially annealed, 1/8” thick x 10 1/2“ high carbon steel blade (hardened to Rockwell C47+2). • Crack and chip proof, even in sub-zero temperatures. • Convex ground, concave axe blade for extreme strength and superior edge holding capabilities. • Chisel sharp sickle hook slices through stubborn vines and briars, and removes unwanted sprout growth at ground level. • Line of balance runs precisely from the grip through the sickle edge creating a natural momentum for efficient, accurate and comfortable swinging motion. • Black powder coating prevents rust and corrosion. • Safety toe, extending one inch up the axe-side of the tool, reduces risk of deflective injuries. Length: 16 ½” overall Weight: 25 oz Made in USA.

name: Pecard Leather Dressing 6oz
description: Category: C.H. Preferred™ Formulas A neutral colored blended paste that keeps leather supple, strong and beautiful. Cleans, conditions, preserves and weatherproofs all smooth oil-tanned leathers. Allows the leather to breathe. Buffs to a soft shine. How to apply: First clean the leather article by wiping it down with a sponge and clean water. You don't need a cleaner unless there is obvious discolorations in the leather. We recommend using a pH neutral cleaner. While the leather is still damp use a soft lint-free cloth, apply a small amount of dressing to the leather. Use a circular motion to work the dressing into the fibers. Continue to do this to all the leather parts of the article. There should only be a sheen on the surface of the leather after working the dressing in. Buff vigorously all areas with a clean cloth to melt the surface waxes to a nice shine. Pecard Leather Dressing will darken your leather, but a minimal amount. It is a great option when you are only looking to preserve as much of the natural color while still protecting your leather. As with any leather treatment, test a small area prior to use to verify it provides the look you desire. -C.H. Available in 6 oz. Made in USA.

name: Council Tool Forged 0-3" C-Clamp
description: Category: Workshop I probably spend too much time working on the collection of axes hanging in my workshop. Whether its sharpening my Velvicut American Felling Axe or oiling a fresh helve for an old double bit I picked up at an antique store. Having a good set of 3" C-Clamps is important to be able to secure the handle to my workbench and these C-Clamps made in the USA by Council Tool Co. are the finest I have encountered. Option of yellow clamp with copper plated spindle and pad or black with black oxide coated spindle and pad. The copper plated C-Clamp is also good for use in welding applications. The Dayton pattern head is a timeless shape and much preferred by skilled woodsmen for a full-sized felling axe. The custom Grade "A" Appalachian hickory handle features a prominent grip and a slim body that allows it to flex a bit, which improves the ergonomics. White sapwood and red heartwood are equally suitable as there is no difference in the specific density or strength of the wood. A Linseed oil coating has been applied to protect the handle. The cutting edge of the 5160 alloy steel head has been tempered to Rc 50-54 to hold an edge, then hand sharpened by an experienced artisan using increasingly fine abrasives and finished with leather stropping. The head has a lifetime warranty from Council Tool. Head: 4 lb. drop forged 5160 alloy steel, tempered to Rockwell 50-54. Handle: Custom - 36 inch (before assembly) Grade "A" Appalachian hickory, selected for grain orientation and density. Overall Weight: Approximately 5-3/4 lbs. name: Randolph Engineering Sportsman Sunglasses - Gold Frame Gray Polycarbonate Lens
description: Category: Eyewear The Randolph Engineering® Sportsman style sunglass is designed for the outdoor enthusiast. Featuring an extremely durable frame to stand up to the harshest of conditions, it is an essential piece of equipment for your next adventure. This model features a gold finished frame, gray polycarbonate lenses and skull style temples. The gray polycarbonate lenses are made with the same material used in the RE Ranger shooting eyewear. 100% distortion free clarity and UV protection in an extremely lightweight, highly impact resistant lens. Perfect for those that prefer extra lightweight eyewear. Randolph Engineering is so confident they make a product which will last you a lifetime they include a maintenance kit with each pair of sunglasses. The kit contains an optical screwdriver along with extra screws and an extra set of nose pads. They also guarantee their solder joints for life, assuming normal use. Each pair also comes with a hard case and RE lens cloth. 52mm is the ideal size for faces measuring 5" from temple to temple. 57mm is the ideal size for faces measuring 5.5" from temple to temple. Free shipping of Randolph Engineering Sunglasses within the United States including Alaska and Hawaii. -C.H. Made in USA.

name: Geier Glove Co. Goatskin Glove
description: Category: Gloves This durable glove, made by Geier Glove from light and light-medium weight goatskin, sports a reinforced palm patch and elastic back, making it an excellent choice for upland bird hunting and the recovery kit in my 4X4. Goatskin is water and abrasion resistant - all the more reason to have it on hand for that special occasion when 80 feet of AmSteel®-Blue is just enough to get you out of a jam. This Geier goatskin glove is intended to fit snugly as you will not need to remove it for jobs requiring dexterity. If you prefer a looser fit you may want to step up half a size. Read more about Geier Glove Co. from our recent factory tour. - C.H. Made in USA. Sizing & Care Information

name: Randolph Engineering Ranger XLW  Shooting Eyewear - 3 Lens Premium Set
description: Category: Eyewear Whether at the range or in the field, eye protection is of the utmost importance, and Randolph Engineering® knows eyewear. They have been making their products by hand right here in America for over 35 years. They have built the RE Ranger series of eyewear for the discriminating shooter. Ranger lenses are designed to protect your eyes while highlighting your target and increasing overall contrast. This RE Ranger XLW™ 3 lens premium set features fast and easily interchangeable optical grade polycarbonate lenses in Medium Yellow, Brown, and Copper Polarized. This combination of lenses was chosen specifically with the upland bird hunter and sport shooter in mind. Design elements of the XLW include the industries first 8-base wrap frame, 100% distortion free NexPC™ lenses, soft silicone notepads with an adjustable nose bridge, military inspired bayonet temples for under head gear or ear protection and a lifetime warranty on all solder joints (assuming normal use). Having the right lens tint is very beneficial for the shooting and outdoor enthusiast. See below the unique attributes of each of these tints included in the set. Randolph's Copper Polarized lens blocks undesirable blue light while improving contrast in other colors. It is an excellent choice for shooting targets against a green background on a bright day. This lens works great for sight fishing as well. The Brown lens set is perfect for hunting game birds against an open background on bright, glaring days. It reduces light and is great at picking up the brown hues of the birds. The Medium Yellow lenses are Randolph's most popular yellow tint. They are designed to highlight orange clay targets and enhance contrast in low light or overcast conditions. Randolph Engineering is so confident they make a product which will last you a lifetime they include a maintenance kit with each XLW set. The kit contains an optical screwdriver along with extra screws and an extra set of nose pads. Fit your XLW frame and up to 9 pairs or RE Ranger lenses in the included crush resistant nylon case. 72mm is the ideal size for faces measuring 5.5" from temple to temple. 64mm is the ideal size for faces measuring 5.3" from temple to temple. Free shipping of Randolph Engineering Sunglasses within the United States including Alaska and Hawaii. -C.H. Made in USA.

It features an assortment of syringes, hospital quality instruments, wound management supplies, bandage materials, an I.V. administration set and sterile Surgeon's glove. name: 3M UltraThon Insect Repellent - 34.34% DEET
description: Category: First Aid Ultrathon™ Lotion is a must for my personal travel kit; I relied on and trusted Ultrathon™ protection while doing relief work in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake. A few years ago someone close to me did some volunteer work in the Dominican Republic, working along side a physician who contracted dengue fever on that trip. Dengue is transmitted by mosquitoes and it is endemic in many countries. These days I make sure she travels with Ultrathon™ Lotion to limit her exposure to bites. -C.H. Originally developed by 3M for the US Military, Ultrathon™ quickly replaced their previous DEET product and is still being used today by troops in all areas of the world. Unique Time Release Protection means DEET is slower to evaporate than with other repellents and provides protection against mosquitoes for up to 12 hours! Advanced 3M formulation creates an effective barrier that repels mosquitoes that may carry West Nile Virus, and ticks that may carry Lyme Disease. Tested in the world's harshest environments – the Central American Jungles. Offers a high level of protection against mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, chiggers, gnats, fleas and deer flies. Splash and sweat resistant. 2 oz. lotion. Active Ingredient: DEET (34.34%). Made in USA.

name: Natrapel 8hr DEET Free Insect Repellent
description: Category: First Aid For those of you that prefer a DEET-free insect repellent here is one that really works! I personally use Natrapel in the states where insect born disease is not a concern for me and I can enjoy the benefits of this great DEET-free formula. -C.H. Natrapel 8-hour provides 8+ hours of protection from biting insects and ticks, thanks to its CDC-recommended 20% Picaridin formula. Unlike ineffective DEET alternatives, Picaridin is the only formula that consistently shows equal or better performance than DEET in independent, clinical tests. Even better, Natrapel 8-hour is completely safe on gear and will not melt jackets, fishing line, and other synthetic materials. 3.5 oz. size provides protection for the whole group! Made in USA.

name: Rite in the Rain Pocket Notebook 4" x 6"
description: Category: All-Weather Writing Headed for somewhere wet? These spiral bound pocket notebooks are great for making notes for yourself or others while you are on your latest adventure or working in any weather conditions. I like to keep one with me wherever I go. I find it convenient to tear out the used sheets when I am done with a day or a task, leaving a fresh looking notebook for my next use. At 4" x 6", they are small enough to fit in a large pocket. The universal pattern pages make this notebook function for both notes and scaled drawings. Rite in the Rain paper is rated Archival, meaning it will last you a lifetime or longer under normal use. The paper is 100% recyclable and the manufacturing process is designed for ultra-low environmental impact. While a pencil works great on our all-weather products, sometimes you just need a pen. The No. 97 All-Weather Clicker Pen, sold seperately, writes on wet paper, upside down and in temperatures from -30F to 250F. Read more about Rite in the Rain from our recent factory tour. See how it works Click Here for a demo video. -C.H Size - 4" x 6" Page Pattern - Universal green or tan Binding - Top wire-o Spiral Cover - Polydura (green or tan) Pages - 100 (50 sheets) Made in USA.

name: Geier Glove Co. for Wood and Metal - Merino Wool Lined Kangaroo Glove
description: Category: Gloves My tour of the Geier Glove Co. factory revealed a lot about the Geier craftsmen and their glove building process. I came away inspired to collaboratively design something truly amazing - a glove that would be comfortable and functional all year long, but at its prime in the fall and winter. When it came to selecting the leather for this custom lined glove, kangaroo was the obvious choice. Kangaroo leather is selected for the finest driving, riding, shooting, and specialty gloves made. It is strong, dense, and wears well, allowing the thickness to be kept at a minimum for extraordinary dexterity in a lined leather glove. It also handles water and holds its shape better than many other leathers. The 100% merino wool liner is an excellent compliment, keeping your hands warm while it absorbs excess moisture coming through the leather or from your skin. These select materials combined make these gloves amazingly comfortable to wear even as the temperature rises, or as you warm up from your activities. As a finishing touch, we use matching kangaroo leather for the binding instead of the common synthetic material. Though the kangaroo binding is more costly and labor intensive, it is the combination of fine details like this that set this glove apart. No one sells a better glove. -C.H. Glove: saddle brown wild kangaroo Liner: 100% Australian merino wool Made in the USA by Geier Glove exclusively for Wood and Metal. Sizing & Care Information

name: Elzetta ZSM-T Tactical Shotgun Mount
description: Category: Flashlights and Acc. The Elzetta ZSM-T tactical shotgun flashlight mount is an extremely solid, reliable and affordable way to mount a tactical flashlight like the Elzetta ZFL-M60-SF2C to your shotgun. It features a quick-release thumb screw so you can quickly switch your light to other weapons or throw it in your pocket on your way to work. The thumb screw is easily tightened with a coin or other flat object when securing the flashlight. The ZSM-T has the ability to hold flashlights from .70 to 1.05 inches in diameter with included adapters. It will fit Remington, Mossberg, Benelli, and other tactical shotguns that have 1 3/4" of free space on the magazine tube and barrel. I have mounted mine to my Nighthawk Custom 870 and have found that it does not move under recoil, nor allow the light to do so. -C.H. Made in USA.
